Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 14,15 Later on , large amounts of CPDT - based photovoltaic polymers were designed and synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| CPDT-based photovoltaic polymers |

The material name entity in the paragraph is "CPDT-based photovoltaic polymers". It is a type of material used in photovoltaics, which are devices that convert light into electricity. The term "CPDT" likely refers to a specific chemical structure or property of the polymer.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

In the paragraph, "CPDT-based photovoltaic polymers" is the only clear reference to a material name. The other terms in the paragraph, such as "large amounts" and "were designed and synthesized," do not refer to specific materials and are not included in the table.
